title: Is it permissible for a woman to ask a question online where men can answer her question?
transcript:
[Questioner] from Bangladesh My question is, is it permissible for 
a woman to ask any kind of question   in an online forum where 
men can answer her question. Well, this needs to be looked 
into, if there is no fitna   and it's not a private chatting with 
a Non-Mahram so it's seen by everyone   and the question is appropriate and decent 
and the answer is appropriate and decent   and there is no possibility of future 
communication or relationship. I believe that   this is totally permissible Insha Allah and that 
there is no problem in that and Allah knows best.
